data.title: What is Chengdu B Market Capitalization? 600880.SHG
data.meta_description: Chengdu B Market Capitalization is currently at 3.97 B. Market Capitalization is the total market value of Chengdu B's equity. It is one of many ways to value Chengdu B and is calculated by multiplying the price of the stock by the number of shares issued. If a firm has one type of stock its market capitalization will be the current market share price multiplied by the number of shares. However, if Chengdu B has multiple types of equities then the market cap will be the total of the market caps of the different types of shares.
